skills.name: RAPID FIRE
desc: • Deals 4 hits of random damage to a single target.
• 15% Chance for each ally to gain an Extra Turn.
• An Extra Turn will let a character attack again if they’ve already acted that turn.

skills.name: MOBILIZE
desc: • Grants Damage Reduction Shield for 2 turns.
• Heal amount based on the ally’s Missing HP.
